title: CS Competency Practical Skill Enhancement: Human Understanding Through Dialogue: Global Citizenship Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Apply listening and empathy skills with over 80% accuracy when conversing with individuals from diverse backgrounds.
Achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in three consecutive formative assessments by proposing solutions using nonviolent communication techniques in conflict situations.

Investigate ≥3 cases where individual uniqueness and group diversity contribute to social development, and create a portfolio (500-word essay + ≥3 visual materials) earning ≥10/12 points on peer/instructor evaluation criteria (creativity, logicality, completeness) with ≥4 points per item
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
